name: Jeff Riley
biography:
Jeff Riley is a Melbourne-based filmmaker who has been involved with community-based media production since 1995.  Riley was actively involved in producing Access News, a weekly half-hour current issues program for community TV station, Channel 31.  He teaches digital video production and non-linear editing, and free-lances on independent documentary projects.  Supporting and encouraging the use of media as an instrument for social change, Riley believes in providing greater community access to media tools and technologies.

Taken from PROOF exhibition 2004 (SW)
